data.title: List of Croatian language television channels
data.meta_description: This is a list of television channels that broadcast in Croatia and/or for a Croatian language audience: Main channels Regional stations in Croatia * Zagrebačka Televizija (Z1) from Zagreb, seen in the city and the Zagreb county * Otvorena…
data.text:
This is a list of television channels that broadcast in Croatia and/or for a Croatian language audience:

Main channels

Regional stations in Croatia

* Zagrebačka Televizija (Z1) - from Zagreb, seen in the city and the Zagreb county

* Otvorena Televizija (OTV) - from Zagreb, seen in the city and the Zagreb county

* Nezavisna Televizija (NeT) - from Kutina, seen in central Croatia

* TV Jadran - from Split, seen in central Dalmatia

* Splitska Televizija - from Split, seen in central Dalmatia

* Televizija Dalmacija - from Split, seen in central Dalmatia

* Kanal 5 - from Split, seen in central Dalmatia

* RI-TV - from Rijeka, seen in Primorje

* Kanal RI - from Rijeka, seen in Primorje

* Televizija Slavonije i Baranje (STV) - from Osijek, seen in northeastern Slavonia and Baranja

* Slavonskobrodska Televizija (SBTV) - from Slavonski Brod, seen in southcentral Slavonia and northern Bosnia in the Posavina region

* Nezavisna Istarska Televizija - from Pazin, seen in Istria

* TV Magic - from Zadar, seen in northern Dalmatia

* Vinkovačka Televizija (VTV) - from Vinkovci, seen in eastern Slavonia

* Varaždinska Televizija (VTV) - from Varaždin, seen in northern Croatia

* Čakovečka Televizija - from Čakovec, seen in Međimurje

* R1TV - from Čakovec, seen in Međimurje

* KDS - - from Čakovec, seen in Međimurje

* TV Nova - from Pula, seen in southern Istria

* TV4rijeke - from Karlovac, seen in Karlovac and part of Karlovac county

Stations in Bosnia and Herzegovina

Because Croatian is also co-official in Bosnia and Herzegovina, there are TV channels there that broadcast in Croatian:

* Televizija Federacije Bosne i Hercegovine, (FTV) - from Sarajevo, state-owned public television, seen in Federation of Bosnia and Herzegovina

* Hercegovačka Televizija Mostar, (HTV) - from Mostar, seen in Herzegovina

Regionalized versions of trans-national television networks

Channels regionalized for Croatia include:

*Hallmark Channel, on cable

*Home Box Office, on cable

By viewing share

Croatian television channels listed by their viewing share 1998-2007.

Those data are not sourced and do not fit with the data from AGB Media Nielsen.
